titleStmt.title: Statutys for the orderi[n]ge of purueyours or achatours for the kynges moost honourable housholde
titleStmt.author: England. King's Household.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on pi1 recto. Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
Statutes for the king's household from 14 Edward III to 23 Henry VI. Translated into English.
Has Pynson's device, McKerrow 9b, with his name on pi4 verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
